CheckTitle: Check if Elastic Load Balancers have SSL listeners.
Description: Check if Elastic Load Balancers have SSL listeners.
Risk: Clear text communication could affect privacy of information in transit.

Code.CLI: aws elb create-load-balancer-listeners --load-balancer-name <lb_name> --listeners Protocol=HTTPS, LoadBalancerPort=443, InstanceProtocol=HTTP, InstancePort=80, SSLCertificateId=<certificate_arn>

Recommendation.Text: Scan for Load Balancers with HTTP or TCP listeners and understand the reason for each of them. Check if the listener can be implemented as TLS instead..
